name: chinafest
0:
”Alexa, open China Fest”
”Alexa, open China Fest and next”
”Alexa, start China Fest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: china fest
des: In China, there are many traditional festivals. Among them, Spring Festival, Qingming Festival, Duanwu Festival and Zhongqiu Festival are among the most important ones. Qingming Festival is bases on solar calendar so it is around April 5th each year(at most one day away). As the Spring Festival,Duanwu Festival and Zhongqiu Festival are not direct related to modern solar calendar, the exact dates need to be checked on chinese calendar. China Fest provide an easy way to check the dates for these important festival for the coming years. It also provides some interesting facts about the chinese festivals. As many places may have special holiday arrangement on these festivals, it is a good idea to check the important date before traveling. Enjoy!
